Close_last_resource: You cannot close the last resource
Default_verse: Насабномаи Исои Масеҳ, Писари Довуд, Писари Иброҳим.
Error_name: Такое имя уже есть в списке макетов
If_no_language: Если вы не нашли в списке свой язык - напишите нам
Invalid_format: неверный формат (проверьте, правильно ли Вы скопировали)
Message_not_send: К сожалению ваше сообщение не доставлено.
Open_OBS: Ҳикояҳои Кушоди Китоби Муқаддасро нишон додан
Problem_loading: Ҳангоми боркунии мундариҷа мушкилот вуҷуд дошт.
Reset_button: Агар ин кор накунад, ин тугмаро пахш кунед "Бозоғоз кардан"
Switch_word_popover: Enable popovers for aligned and original language words
Text_under_checkbox_error:
Агар шумо хато ёфтед – оятро бо
тугмаи ростпахш кунед дар
телефон дер пахш кунед.
Thanks_report2: Дастаи тарчумони мо, хатман дархости шуморо кор карда мебарояд.
introStart:
Дар пеши шумо роҳбари интерактавӣ бо илова.
Мо мехоҳем ба шумо функқионалро нишон диҳем.
Саҳифаро давом диҳед!
introAppBar:
In the upper part there is an application bar (app bar).
In the center you can select 'Bible' or 'Open Bible Stories'(OBS). Next are the buttons that display the current address. By pressing the buttons in the 'Bible' mode, you can select a book and chapter, and in the 'OBS' mode, you can select a story. On the right is a button that opens the main menu (hamburger menu).
introBookList: The book selection dialog. After selecting a book, the chapter selection window will automatically open.
introSettings:
The settings menu allows you to change the theme and font, disable tooltips for original words, hide images in OBS, and split text into passages.
You can also save your desktop layouts, share layouts with other translators, and add other people's layouts.
introShortCuts:
You can switch a book, chapter, verse using hotkeys (shortcuts):
ctrl + shift + right - next book
ctrl + shift + left - previous book
ctrl + right - next chapter
ctrl + left - previous chapter
ctrl + down - next verse
ctrl + up - previous verse

In mobile devices, you can switch between chapters:
swipe left - previous chapter,
swipe right - next chapter.
introWorkSpace: This is a workspace. It contains cards that you can add, delete, change the size, location.
introCard:
Each card displays the source (Bible translation, OBS, educational resources, resources for translators)
To simultaneously view translations in different cards, you need to:
- click on the verse with the left mouse button,
- use keyboard shortcuts ctrl+down and ctrl+up,
- if you work from a mobile device - just tap on the verse
introVerse: Шумо метавонед бо ҳар як оят алоҳида кор кунед. Вақте ки шумо онро пахш мекунед, истинод ҷорӣ тағир меёбад, ки ба шумо имкон медиҳад маълумоти иловагиро дар кортҳои кушода бо маводи таълимӣ (TN, TQ, TA, TW) тағир диҳед
introContextMenu: When you right-click or press and hold on any verse, the context menu opens. You can copy a verse or send an error message in this verse.
introReportDialog: Вақте ки шумо элементи пешниҳоди хатоҳоро истифода мебаред, ҳатман эзоҳро илова кунед. Пас аз фиристодани паём, ба шумо оина бо пайванде пешкаш карда мешавад, ки дар он шумо паёми худро дар феҳристи git.door43.org сабт карда метавонед
introHamburger:
The main menu of the application. Here you can:
- add a new card
- reset the workspace state (the cards will open by default)
- change the interface language
- open settings menu
- send a message for feedback
- open user's guide
- view the app version and changelog
introObsSelect: The button that opens the history selection dialog
introObsShortCuts:
You can switch the story or verse using hotkeys (shortcuts):
ctrl + right - next story
ctrl +left - previous story
ctrl + down - next verse
ctrl + up - previous verse
alt + O - Show/Hide images from OBS

In mobile devices, you can switch between stories:
swipe left - previous story,
swipe right - next story
